doc:
Jack Jones (singer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Jones_(singer) 0 John Allan Jones (born January 14, 1938) known professionally as Jack Jones, is an American actor and jazz and pop singer, popular during the 1960s. He is the son of actor/singer Allan Jones and actress Irene Hervey. Jones is primarily a straight-pop singer (even when he recorded contemporary material) whose ventures in the direction of jazz are mostly of the big band/swing variety. Jones has won two Grammy Awards.He continues to perform concerts around the world and remains popular in Las Vegas. Jones is widely known for his recordings of "Wives and Lovers" (1964 Grammy Award, Best Pop Male Performance), "The Race Is On", "Lollipops and Roses" (1962, Grammy Award, Best Pop Male Performance), "The Impossible Dream", "Call Me Irresponsible", "Lady", and "The Love Boat Theme". He was also the voice of Greg's frog in the 2014 animated television miniseries Over the Garden Wall. John_Allan_Jones ( born January_14_,_1938 ) known professionally as Jack_Jones , is an_American_actor and jazz_and_pop_singer , popular during the_1960s . He is the_son of actor/singer_Allan_Jones and actress_Irene_Hervey . Jones is primarily a_straight-pop_singer ( even when he recorded contemporary_material_) whose_ventures in the_direction of jazz are mostly of the_big_band/swing_variety . Jones has_won two_Grammy_Awards.He continues_to_perform concerts around the_world and remains popular in Las_Vegas . Jones is_widely_known for his_recordings of "_Wives_and_Lovers " ( 1964_Grammy_Award , Best_Pop Male_Performance_) , " The_Race Is On " , " Lollipops_and_Roses " (_1962 , Grammy_Award , Best_Pop Male_Performance_) , " The_Impossible_Dream " , " Call Me Irresponsible " , " Lady_" , and " The_Love_Boat_Theme_" . He was also the_voice of Greg 's_frog in the_2014_animated_television_miniseries Over the_Garden_Wall .
